messages.subject: Look!  Up in the sky!
messages.msgSnippet: ***... but if we lift Sandra up on the highest of pedestals then it makes everyone else look short or deficient.  That isn t a good idea.*** But I AM short and
messages.messageBody:
***... but if we lift Sandra up on the highest of
pedestals then it makes everyone else look short or deficient. That
isn't a good idea.***

But I AM short and deficient compared to Sandra.<g>
I haven't had the desire to put her on a pedestal though. I think it'd
be pretty lonely up there and she'd be closer to the vultures who want to
pick at her the minute they think they spot a weakness. I appreciate
that she's down here, willingly, where the rest of us can hang around her
and benefit from her smarts.

Deb L, the deficient.
